classes.name: Murder
classes.description: This is a license to kill

classes.name: No maiming
classes.description: This license does not allow you to maim your opponents

classes.name: Trial by combat
classes.description: You agree to waive your right to a court trial, binding arbitration, or any other mode of dispute resolution except for a trial by combat, which will be conducted from sunrise until sunset on the seventeenth day of the month during which the dispute arose, excepting the month of July, when the duel will take place on the eighteenth. Each party will be permitted only one of the following weapons, of his or her choosing: rubber chicken, war balloon, or weaponized toaster oven.
